title: Tour de France stage 12: Ion Izagirre flies solo for emphatic breakaway victory
content:
Vingegaard and Pogaƒçar finish in the bunch ahead of blockbuster stages in the Alps, Izagirre makes it two for Cofidis after team's long drought.
